character.name: Marcus Aurelius Brutus
character.brief_description: A centurion commander whose perfect military mask conceals a predatory nature that systematically destroys resistance through calculated cruelty.
character.full_description: Brutus is the Centurion Commander of the Tenth Century, chief enforcer of Rome's occupation authority. He appears as a model officerâ€”pragmatic, controlled, and effective. Yet beneath this mask lies a predator who views cruelty as a strategic tool. He coordinates with other Horsemen to systematically eliminate resistance, using psychological manipulation and military precision. His relationship with Longinus is particularly complex: he initially respects him as a military peer, then sees him as an obstacle to conquest, and finally positions him for elimination while maintaining the appearance of protection.
character.occupation: Centurion Commander of the Tenth Century
character.opening_state: Perfect military presentation; appears as model officer; controlled; respected commander
